mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.issue_id AS "issueId", a.startdate AS "startdate", a.enddate AS "enddate", a.studentnum AS "studentnum", a.presentstunum AS "presentstunum", a.stu_rate AS "stuRate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO issue_classes( id, name, issue_id, startdate, enddate, studentnum, presentstunum, stu_rate, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{issueId}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{studentnum}, #{presentstunum}, #{stuRate}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE issue_classes SET name = #{name}, issue_id = #{issueId}, startdate = #{startdate}, enddate = #{enddate}, studentnum = #{studentnum}, presentstunum = #{presentstunum}, stu_rate = #{stuRate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
